title: Improving Alerts for Flooded Roadways
subtitle: with Watershed Protection Department
excerpt: We’re working with Austin’s Watershed Protection Department to improve how ATXfloods provides information about the status of roadway closures to the public and emergency services.

title: Austin Digital Services Discovery
subtitle: with Austin Resource Recovery and Communications & Public Information Office
excerpt: We want to learn what’s not working about our current website and to define, and more importantly—test new methods for developing and accessing City of Austin digital services.

title: Homelessness Outreach Street Team
subtitle: with Austin Police Department, Austin-Travis County Integral Care, Austin-Travis County Emergency Medical Services, and Downtown Austin Alliance
excerpt: The Homelessness Outreach Street Team (HOST) represents a new collaborative initiative in Austin’s Central Business District to address proactively the needs of people living on the streets.

title: Project Tracking
subtitle: with Communications and Technology Management
excerpt: We're seeking to make it easier for people in Austin to have a sense of what projects the City is working on, their state of progress, how they relate to critical goals, and how they are funded.

title: Smart City Strategic Roadmap
subtitle: with Communications and Technology Management
excerpt: The Austin community and city government partners worked together to collaboratively draft this roadmap to inform City policy decision-making, help the community tackle local challenges, and help the city improve service delivery.
